game_description: One of the scariest things about an interview is not knowing what questions the interviewer is going to ask. But with a little bit of preparation and a lot of practice, you can learn how to craft impactful and compelling answers to almost any question. Bodyswaps Job Interview Simulator prepares job seekers to put on their best performance at their next interview. Through 4 modules, learners receive tailored guidance and personalised coaching on essential techniques like managing anxiety, connecting personal characteristics to the job description, and how to construct the perfect answer to practically any question, before attempting the ultimate interview simulation. In this demo, meet virtual careers counsellors Ashley and Will and put your interview skills to the test. Practise answering 5 interview questions, selected from no less than 60 available in the complete package. And discover the power of ‘Bodyswapping’ with AI-enabled behavioural data for fine-tuning performance.
